casebody.data:
EDER V. HAUGHWOUT, and another, Plaintiffs and Respondents, v. CORNELIUS K. GARRISON AND ANOTHER, DEFENDANTS AND APPELLANTS.

Before Speir and Sanford, JJ.

Heard February, 1876; Decided March 20, 1876. C. Bainbridge Smith, for appellants. *551Sullivan, Kobbe and Fowler, for respondents. Appeal by defendants from a judgment entered on the report of a referee. The only question involved was whether the findings of fact were sustained by the evidence. Speir, J.,

wrote for affirmance.

Sanford, J., concurred.
